info.title: MetaFull Web Metadata API
info.description: Convert web pages into meaningful metadata. Use the tools and languages you know to access the Metafull API at scale.

get.description: The metadata api is a tool to extract the topics, author, content sentiment and readable summary for any link.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to analyze and return metadata on.

get.description: The sentiment analysis api is a tool to determine the overall negative or positive sentiment in a text string.
The social shares api is used to get a page link's popularity on social networks like Facebook and Twitter.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to analyze for social network activity.

get.description: The topic extraction api is a tool to find, extract and categorize all the topics in a text string.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text string to analyze. (Note use POST for text strings greater than 2k.)
